stimulusHtml: What would be the most appropriate way to operationally define the effectiveness of this advertisement technique?

features.html: A coffee association wants to increase sales of coffee in one region of the United States. To do so, it puts up billboards on major highways in that region with the following message.

choicesHtml: Sales of coffee in restaurants near the billboard
The length of time people look at the billboard
The number of billboards in the region that contain the message
Sales of billboards in the region
